resources.string: select * from StoryType order by seq
select * from Story where not deleted order by create_date desc
select * from StoryItem where story_id = ? order by seq
insert into StoryItem (story_id, state, label, seq, note) select ? as story_id, 0 as state, label, seq, \'\' from StoryItemType where story_type_id = ?

string-array.name: create_db
string-array.item: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS StoryType (_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, name TEXT, seq INTEGER NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS StoryItemType (_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, story_type_id INTEGER NOT NULL, label TEXT NOT NULL, seq INTEGER NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Story (_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, headline TEXT, create_date DATETIME, type TEXT, last_edit_date INTEGER, deleted BOOLEAN)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS StoryItem (_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, story_id INTEGER NOT NULL, state INTEGER NOT NULL, label TEXT NOT NULL, note TEXT, seq INTEGER NOT NULL)

string-array.name: insert_init_data
string-array.item: insert into StoryType (_id, name, seq) values (0, \'Accidents\', 0)
insert into StoryType (_id, name, seq) values (1, \'Biography\', 1)
insert into StoryType (_id, name, seq) values (2, \'Budget Adoption\', 2)
insert into StoryType (_id, name, seq) values (3, \'Courts - iil Action\', 3)

insert into StoryType (_id, name, seq) values (10, \'Interviews -- Colin Howell style\', 10)

insert into StoryType (_id, name, seq) values (12, \'News Conferences\', 12)

insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (0, \'Type(s) of vehicle(s) involved\', 2)

insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (0, \'Accounts by eyewitnesses, investigating officers\', 14)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (1, \'Name\', 0)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (1, \'Date of birth\', 1)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (1, \'Place of birth\', 2)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (1, \'Date of death\', 3)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (1, \'Place of death\', 4)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (1, \'Physical description\', 5)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (1, \'Character / Personality\', 6)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (1, \'Education (include any degrees earned)\', 7)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (1, \'Personal relationships (family, friends, work colleagues)\', 8)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (1, \'Awards / Honours / Formal Recognition\', 9)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (1, \'List at least FIVE important dates from the person`s life and explain why these dates are significant\', 10)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (1, \'Summarize major contributions to society and the world\', 11)

insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (1, \'List at least THREE major political or social events which occurred during this person`s life. For each event, explain how you think it may have affected your biographical subject\', 12)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (2, \'Amount to be spent\', 0)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (2, \'New or increased taxes, higher licence and permit fees, and other income that will be necessary to meet expenditure\', 1)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (2, \'Cuts, if any, to be made in such taxes, fees, or fines\', 2)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (2, \'Comparison with preceding year(s)\', 3)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (2, \'Justification for increases sought, cuts made\', 4)

insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (2, \'Patterns behind the submission and subsequent adjustments, like political motives, pressure groups, historical factors\', 6)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (2, \'Consequences of budget for: agencies, departments, businesses, the public\', 7)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (3, \'Identification of person or organisation filing action\', 0)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (3, \'Background of plaintiff or petitioner\', 1)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (3, \'Defendent or respondent\', 2)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (3, \'Type of damage alleged\', 3)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (3, \'Remedy sought\', 4)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (3, \'Date of filing, court of jurisdiction\', 5)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (3, \'Special motivation behind action if any\', 6)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (3, \'History of the conflict, disagreement\', 7)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (3, \'Similar cases decided by courts (precedents)\', 8)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (3, \'Could suit lead to a landmark action? Is it a precedent?\', 9)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (3, \'Possibility of an out of court settlement\', 10)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (3, \'Significance of action, effect on others\', 11)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (3, \'Lawyers for both sides\', 12)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (3, \'Date and presiding judge for trial, hearing\', 13)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (3, \'Judge`s / magistrate`s reputation with similar cases\', 14)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (4, \'Verdict. Damages, if awarded. (Same, less, greater than those sought)\', 0)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (4, \'Parties involved\', 1)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (4, \'Judge`s statement, if any. Deviations by judge from assessors` findings.\', 2)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (4, \'Summary of allegations by plaintiff\', 3)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (4, \'Key testimony and attorney/advocate`s points\', 4)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (4, \'Length of deliberations\', 5)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (4, \'Comment by assessors on deliberations, verdict\', 6)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (4, \'Any appeals or motions\', 7)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (5, \'Identification of victim\', 0)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (5, \'Crime, how committed\', 1)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (5, \'Date, time, location of crime\', 2)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (5, \'Violent crime: official cause of death, injury; weapon used; motivation; background of victim if relevant\', 3)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (5, \'Property crime: value of loss; method of theft or entry\', 4)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (5, \'Arrests, suspects, clues\', 5)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (5, \'Unusual circumstances\', 6)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (5, \'Quotes of victim, witnesses, police\', 7)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (6, \'Dead\', 0)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (6, \'Injured\', 1)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (6, \'Total affected or in danger\', 2)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (6, \'Cause of death\', 3)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (6, \'Estimated death and injury toll\', 4)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (6, \'Eyewitness accounts\', 5)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (6, \'Property loss and damage: Homes,land, public utilities, permanent damage\', 6)

insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (6, \'Rescue and relief operations: Evacuations, heroism, unusual equipment used or unique rescue techniques, number of official personnel and volunteers\', 7)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (6, \'Warnings: Health department, public utility, police statements\', 8)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (6, \'Looting\', 9)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (6, \'Number of spectators\', 10)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (6, \'Insurance\', 11)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (6, \'Lawsuits\', 12)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (6, \'Arrests\', 13)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (6, \'Investigations\', 14)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (7, \'Show people in action\', 0)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (7, \'Quote people\', 1)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (7, \'Let the action and quotes carry the piece\', 2)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (7, \'Begin with a delayed intro\', 3)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (7, \'Get to the main theme within six paragraphs\', 4)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (7, \'Blend necessary background into movement of piece\', 5)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (7, \'End on a high note\', 6)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (8, \'Deaths, injuries\', 0)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (8, \'Identification of victims\', 1)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (8, \'Location, type of structure(s)\', 2)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (8, \'Cause (from official source)\', 3)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (8, \'When, where started, how spread\', 4)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (8, \'When brought under control\', 5)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (8, \'How victims killed, injured\', 6)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (8, \'Property loss: extent, cost of damage, insurance\', 7)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (8, \'Investigation, unusual circumstances\', 8)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (8, \'Where dead, injured taken; extent of injuries\', 9)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (8, \'Rescue attempts\', 10)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (8, \'Comments of neighbours, eyewitnesses\', 11)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (8, \'Number of fire engines, firefighters\', 12)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (8, \'Sources: Fire chief, police, hospital, mortuary, welfare agencies\', 13)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (9, \'Research background on person and subject\', 0)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (9, \'Establish relationship with subject quickly\', 1)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (9, \'Use general opening questions to get subject talking easily\', 2)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (9, \'Move to main subject soon after.\', 3)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (9, \'Ask specific questions like `how did you kill him` rather than `tell me about your life`\', 4)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (9, \'Be ready to move to another subject if the interview is dragging\', 5)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (9, \'Listen and watch attentively\', 6)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (9, \'Let `em talk. Don`t interrupt\', 7)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (9, \'Keep your questions short\', 8)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (9, \'If the answer is `no comment`, ask the question differently\', 9)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (9, \'Put the notebook away if it makes `em nervous\', 10)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (9, \'Never debate, never argue\', 11)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (9, \'Never make statements\', 12)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (9, \'Be cooperative\', 13)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (9, \'Note stress factors - frequent leg crossing, doodling,playing with papers\', 14)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (9, \'Don`t avoid tough embarrassing questions, but make sure they`re necessary, and time them right\', 15)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (9, \'Never accept a retroactive off-the-record requests\', 16)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (9, \'Do not tamper with quotes; paraphrase if necessary\', 17)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (9, \'Avoid requests for anonymity whenever possible\', 18)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (10, \'Name\', 0)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (10, \'Age\', 1)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (10, \'Marital status\', 2)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (10, \'Children\', 3)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (10, \'Professional position\', 4)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (10, \'Residing in (suburb)\', 5)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (10, \'What are your strengths?\', 6)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (10, \'What are your weaknesses?\', 7)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (10, \'What makes you tick?\', 8)

insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (10, \'What`s not so great about South Africa?\', 11)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (10, \'Are you paid too much?\', 12)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (10, \'Pet hates?\', 13)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (10, \'You`re stuck on a desert island -- who and what would you take with you?\', 14)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (10, \'Favourite food?\', 15)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (10, \'Favourite music?\', 16)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (10, \'Favourite film?\', 17)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (10, \'Favourite writer?\', 18)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (10, \'Last book you read?\', 19)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (10, \'Favourite sport?\', 20)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (10, \'Who are your role models?\', 21)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (10, \'In general, rules are there to be ...\', 22)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (10, \'If you could do it all again, what would you change?\', 23)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (10, \'If you were president for a day, what would you do?\', 24)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (10, \'Who would you most like to be?\', 25)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (10, \'What do you do for fun?\', 26)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (10, \'Describe your ideal evening out\', 27)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (10, \'Do you like designer label goods?\', 28)
insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (10, \'What`s the best present you ever received?\', 29)

insert into StoryItemType (story_type_id, label, seq) values (10, \'When last were you naughty?\', 35)
